h2_title: The New West Luojia Fragrant Vines
h3_title: Outside the Wheel Luojia Fragrant Vine
content: The Outside the Wheel Luojia Fragrant Vine is in the cave you will pass through after defeating Captain Wise-Voice. Follow the path until you reach a room with a large pool of water in the center. The vine will be draped across the branches of a tree on the left side of the room.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Luojia_Fragrant_Vine_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations', specifically from the subsection 'The New West Luojia Fragrant Vines' and the sub-subsection 'Outside the Wheel Luojia Fragrant Vine'.
The content is as follows:
The Outside the Wheel Luojia Fragrant Vine is in the cave you will pass through after defeating Captain Wise-Voice. Follow the path until you reach a room with a large pool of water in the center. The vine will be draped across the branches of a tree on the left side of the room.
